thread.title: Flavor Flav gets February trial date in traffic case
thread.title_full: Flavor Flav gets February trial date in traffic case

title: Flavor Flav gets February trial date in traffic case
text:
Frank Eltman Flavor Flav gets February trial date in traffic case 
Entertainer Flavor Flav, left, standing with attorney Todd Greenberg, speaks with reporters after pleading guilty to one count of aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Mineola, N.Y. Flav, whose real name is William Drayton, Jr., was arrested in January, 2014 while racing to his mother's funeral on Long Island. A judge in Nassau Criminal Court on Tuesday sentenced Flav to time served, essentially the time he was in custody following the arrest. He was fined $3,600. (AP Photo/Frank Eltman) Posted: Friday, October 16, 2015 3:37 am | Updated: 4:01 am, Fri Oct 16, 2015.   The trial   has been postponed until Feb. 8 for misdemeanor   star, whose real  mph   fined
